login.title: Welcome back!
login.userDeactivatedError: This user has been deactivated. Please contact your homeserver
login.limitExceededError: Too many requests. Try again in a few minutes.
login.unknownError: An unknown error occured with the homeserver
login.noResponseError: The homeserver provided is not a Matrix homeserver or it is unreachable
login.invalidUsernameError: There can only be one colon (:) in a matrix user id
login.noStoredCredentialsError: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again
login.unknownTokenError: The token is no longer valid. We must have been disconnected.
login.invalidHomeserverError: This does not appear to be a matrix homeserver
